title: About
text:
This blog is run by Scott Bell who is currently a Databricks SME at Avanade. His background is Data Engineering, Architecture and Data Science.
I write a few other places, the DailyDatabricks Twitter and my codementor blog
The Aim of this blog is to capture knowledge on technical subjects while also allowing for interesting and often pointless data exploration.
It’s supposed to be fun, that is all!

title: Back to the Data
text:
A lot has happened in the last few years but first I want to just get on with writing code and analysing data.
If you’re not familar yet, I run a (sometimes daily) Databricks Tips, tricks and hacks twitter account. That is followed by quite a few databricks people. I would recommend following it or signing up the even less frequent newsletter :)
